content: row 3 crochet a double_crochet border around the entire perimeter to neaten chain 3 double_crochet 7 turn the edges row 4 that s it chain 3 3 double_crochet-cluster into next 3 sts i d love to see your finished catan blanket send me a picture over instagram @the_crafty_quince or by email at thecraftyquince@gmail com joining the pieces happy settling 🙂 you can arrange the hexagons in any way you choose i thought it would be fun to do it in the way the actual game instructions recommend for beginners see the illustration to the right to connect the hexagons you can use any method you like as long as the joins are visible but don t stick out too much that is single crochets wouldn t really work but neither would an invisible join i did a hybrid between a zipper stitch and a zigzag stitch however in my version instead of putting your hook through both of the back loops of both of the hexagons you re joining and pulling the yarn through insert your hook through the back loop of one hexagon pull the yarn through then insert your hook into the back loop of the other hexagon and pull your yarn through do not pull the yarn too tight
